column5: Heads up, Fire Ban for most of Ontario. $500 + fine if caught.  http://local2.ca/ssm/viewarticle.php?id=5884
Wow that sucks...drinking beer in the dark's no fun.
Imagine a May 24 weekend with excellent weather,now a fire ban!The campers can't win.,Looks as though Barrie is in the OK zone..Happy camping everyone!!!!!!!!.
No bans here. Lifted at the beginning of April.
Check out post #13 in the other fire ban thread. The ban covers all of Ontario except the very southern part.
.. also doesn't cover the eastern section.. down Madoc way, but at this rate with no rain and no real rain in the forecast he just jinxed himself!

It's been raining here almost all day and had rain yesterday too. Had regular rain here most of all May actually. I always check on my local fire department's website and also on my community website for current fire related information before burning or setting off fireworks.
